definition: To change the direction or orientation of something, often by turning it around or flipping it over. It is commonly used when referring to the act of turning a vehicle, object, or oneself in a different direction.

examples.german: Bitte wenden Sie das Blatt um.
Er hat sich von mir abgewendet.
Sie wendet ihre Aufmerksamkeit anderen Dingen zu.
examples.english: She directs her attention to other things.

examples.german: Wir m√ºssen uns an den Verkehr wenden.
examples.english: We need to turn to the traffic authorities.
